text: Kamata tɨmbahɨrɨs mɨŋamu hambu ŋgata kɨva nɨŋuva hama naŋga kuyu mɨŋgumu. Kamata ambamu, Kru ndaŋɨnɨŋ sɨhɨndɨvu pata mɨŋgɨya hɨrɨvɨ taya sɨmbɨra mɨŋayu ndaŋɨnɨŋ tɨmbahɨrɨs arɨŋ ŋguna maña nurɨŋ ŋguna. Ara kɨvɨsuŋ nda kɨta sɨmbɨra tɨkatɨka mɨŋaharɨŋ arɨŋ ina kɨrahɨmuhi pata kɨvɨtititɨ, vamba ambamu.
